summary: A rich girl falls for an older hippie boy. Her parents don't approve and try to stop her from seeing him.
cast: Alessio Orano|Ornella Muti|Luigi Pistilli|Chris Avram|Roby Ruberti|Fortunato Arena|Stella Carnacina|Aristide Caporale|Antonio Piretti|Giulio Baraghini|Gianni Pulone
title: ¿Violación bajo el sol?
